oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Roll call of Co. F, 6th Tenn. Cav.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Roll call of Co. F, 6th Tenn. Cav. by Levi Thompson for the pleasure of the surviving brethren." The roll lists the name, age, enlistment date and mustered in date for each member of the company. The roll is in pieces, and has been taped in sections. On the back of the roll, Thompson writes, "Comrades we will soon all meet in an eternal rendezvous"
